name: Depo.sk
author: oktodigital.com

sections.description:
Full featured WooCommerce shipping module for allowing shop providers to implement Depo.sk services to their websites. Customers can choose their desired pickup place on a map or using a dropdown or they can choose delivet to address option.

Highlights:
* Supports shipping zones
* Supports shipping classes
* Submit orders directly to depo.sk trough API
* Prints label for packages ( multiple at once )
* Cancel / change / edit customer pickup address
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder depo-sk to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Navigate to WooCommerce shipping settings and select Depo.sk
  4. Fill your Depo.sk account information (aquired from Depo.sk)
  5. Go to WooCommerce shipping zones and create shipping method.

short_description: A WooCommerce shipping module for Slovak package delivery provider Depo.sk.
description:
Full featured WooCommerce shipping module for allowing shop providers to implement Depo.sk services to their websites. Customers can choose their desired pickup place on a map or using a dropdown or they can choose delivet to address option.

Highlights:
* Supports shipping zones
* Supports shipping classes
* Submit orders directly to depo.sk trough API
* Prints label for packages ( multiple at once )
* Cancel / change / edit customer pickup address

upgrade_notice.2.9: Compatibility fix with new version of WP and PHP. General tweaks of plugin.
upgrade_notice.2.8: Added new way to show pick-up points on map using iframe. This feature replaces the original display methods.
upgrade_notice.2.7: Fixed showing places in select on mobile devices
upgrade_notice.2.6: Compatibility fix with new version of WP
upgrade_notice.2.4: Added settings about sending price without coupons value. It is required to save plugin settings before using this feature
upgrade_notice.2.3: Changed default settings about picking up package from store address
upgrade_notice.2.2: Compatibility fix with new version of WP and PHP
upgrade_notice.2.1: Added option to pick up from shop address
